verbs.description: [ARG0: Stephanie Clifford] [V: said] [ARG1: her former lawyer colluded with President Donald Trump ’s long - term attorney , Michael Cohen , in a bid to make her lie about her alleged tryst with Trump] .

Stephanie Clifford said [ARG0: her former lawyer] [V: colluded] [ARG1: with President Donald Trump ’s long - term attorney , Michael Cohen ,] [ARG2: in a bid to make her lie about her alleged tryst with Trump] .

Stephanie Clifford said [ARG0: her former lawyer] colluded with President Donald Trump ’s long - term attorney , Michael Cohen , in a bid to [V: make] [ARG1: her lie about her alleged tryst with Trump] .
